reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Chen is very knowledgeable and passionate about biology. Her lectures are engaging, but the workload can be heavy at times.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Fantastic professor! Prof. Johnson brings history to life with his storytelling abilities. Assignments are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Williams knows her subject well, but her teaching style can be a bit dry. Office hours are helpful for clarifying concepts.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Prof. Lee is great at explaining complex programming concepts. His projects are tough but really improve your coding skills.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Green is an amazing teacher! She makes chemistry fun and easy to understand. Her lab sessions are particularly well-organized.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor seems disinterested in teaching. Lectures are confusing and he's not very approachable for questions.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is patient and thorough in her explanations. Her problem sets are challenging but great for learning.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson is incredibly thought-provoking. His discussions are engaging and he encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez knows her stuff, but sometimes struggles to explain complex concepts. Extra study is often necessary.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson's passion for literature is contagious. His essay assignments really help improve writing skills.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is an outstanding professor. Her lectures are engaging and she relates course material to real-world issues effectively.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. White is knowledgeable but his lectures can be monotonous. The course material is interesting though.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Lee presents balanced views on complex political issues. Her debates are thought-provoking and well-moderated.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Harris is a musical genius! He breaks down complex theories in an easy-to-understand manner. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is passionate about the environment. Her field trips really enhance the learning experience.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Moore's lectures are disorganized and hard to follow. He seems more focused on his research than teaching.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia is an exceptional educator. She explains complex brain functions clearly and her enthusiasm is infectious.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Wright knows his subject well, but can be impatient with questions. His projects are interesting but often unclear.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Turner brings anthropology to life with her field experience. Her assignments encourage critical thinking about culture.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Davis is knowledgeable but his teaching style is very technical. Office hours are crucial for understanding the material.
